entry.title: Safe Under the Surface
entry.summary:
Author: sarriathmg

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,004Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: It's been a year since Dick captured Jason... since Dick became Sir.Jason rarely comes out of subspace these days. Sir likes to keep him under almost all hours of the day, whether to matriculate him into being the plaything Sir wants, or as a way to torment him in his revenge against his former mentor. entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,394Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 9

Summary: What if the end of the world wasn’t just about destruction—but about love rewriting fate?In this story, Tim Drake is pulled into NERV, an organization that controls powerful mechs to fight off monstrous beings known as Angels. But saving the world is only half the battle—he also has to deal with all sorts of problems, especially his love-struck brothers and his own complicated feelings.As Tim faces powerful enemies to protect humanity, love, trust, and heartbreak start to shift the story from a tale of survival to something more—something deeper. Because in a world where everything seems predetermined, can the love between two people be enough to change destiny itself?If you’re looking for an epic mix of high-stakes action, deep emotions, and a love story powerful enough to defy fate—this is for you.

entry.title: Teen Titans - ReBeL Yell; If I Had Stayed A Renegade
entry.summary:
Author: InkBlot31

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 200,177Chapters: 65/?Kudos: 44

Summary: “You’ve fallen too far. It’s time to give up on a normal living, apprentice. You can’t ever have that. Being what you are.”He reminded Dick of what the boy had been forced to participate in. Terra's capture and containment was his crux. His friends still had probes under their flesh and all life; Slade wouldn’t take them one, not until Dick was fully his Renegade. Bruce was, sorry? Could he really right this as the dark knight this time? Dick had fled, he’d done nothing of the bat’s teachings –he’d rejected all of it, all of it…Because, he wasn’t a hero right now. He was a kid that they both had wanted to in their own twisted way…call their ward, charge. Whatever. But, never a son. Not that, not Slade. He’d lost one, then Terra was his worst mistake. And Robin, his very best. Batman had issues with bonding over BEING the one to hold them together. There would be no more Titans or Robin if he said yes to his first guess. His second, was no savior in the dark, since….He needed to be free of them, but for how long could he flee his fate?

entry.title: a grave in the sky (where it's roomy to lie)
entry.summary:
Author: svalas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,294Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 76

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. A phoenix had been carved into the side. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. Then he flinched and had to remind himself—not Jason. Jason’s dead. Just the Joker.) or, what might have happened in UTRH if Black Mask was just a bit smarter
